Title: Spectre.Console
Description: A .NET library that makes it easier to create beautiful console applications.

Title: JetBrains Rider
Description: The world's most loved .NET and game dev IDE. Now free for non-commercial use.

Title: Visual Studio Code
Description: Free and built on open source. Integrated Git, debugging and extensions. Install C# Dev Kit.

Title: Humanizer
Description: Humanizer meets all your .NET needs for manipulating and displaying strings, enums, dates, times, timespans, numbers and quantities.

Title: Lua-CSharp
Description: High performance Lua interpreter implemented in C# for .NET and Unity.

Title: NodaTime
Description: Noda Time is an alternative date and time API for .NET. It helps you to think about your data more clearly, and express operations on that data more precisely.

Title: Octokit
Description: .NET SDK in C# for GitHub's standard GitHub.com product.

Title: FastLZMA2Net
Description: Fast LZMA2 Wrapper for .NET. Windows only.

Title: SharpCompress
Description: Fully managed C# library to deal with many compression types and formats.

Title: Snappier
Description: Pure C# port of Google's Snappy compression algorithm. It is designed with speed as the primary goal, rather than compression ratio, and is ideal for compressing network traffic.

Title: Snappy
Description: Uses P/Invoke to C++ for great performance. However, it only works on Windows, and is a bit heap allocation heavy in some cases. It also hasn't been updated since 2014 (as of 10/2020). This project may still be the best choice if your project is on the legacy .NET Framework on Windows, where Snappier is much less performant.

Title: ZstdSharp
Description: Port of zstd compression library to C#.

Title: Stowage
Description: Bloat-free zero dependency .NET cloud storage kit that supports at minimum THE major cloud providers.
